title: Act 2008 (No. 7 of 2008) (as adapted by the Foreign Affairs (Alteration of Name
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Criminal Justice (Mutual Assistance) Act
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Criminal Justice (Mutual Assistance) Act 

2008 (Designation of the United Arab Emirates) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited criminal justice (mutual assistance) act 2008 (designation united arab emirates) order 2025

title: Act 2008 (No. 7 of 2008) (as adapted by the Foreign Affairs (Alteration of Name
heading: 2. The United Arab Emirates is designated for the purposes of mutual
text_raw:
2. The United Arab Emirates is designated for the purposes of mutual 
assistance between the State and that state under the Criminal Justice (Mutual 
Assistance) Act 2008 (No. 7 of 2008) in accordance with the Treaty on Mutual 
Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters between Ireland and the United Arab 
Emirates signed on 21 October 2024. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

20 May, 2025. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Minister for Foreign Affairs and Trade. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 27th May, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [206] 3

title: Act 2008 (No. 7 of 2008) (as adapted by the Foreign Affairs (Alteration of Name
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order designates the United Arab Emirates for the purposes of mutual 
assistance between the State and that state under the Criminal Justice (Mutual 
Assistance) Act 2008 (No. 7 of 2008), in accordance with the Treaty on Mutual 
Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters between Ireland and the United Arab 
Emirates. 

 
 
 
 4 [206]
